plugin.name: Select gender
plugin.description: The plugin can restrict visiting of profiles of the same gender or vice versa, it can allow members of the same gender visit profiles of each other. This option can be applied for the photos as well. One can configure the search and join page that way so a male can find females only and vice versa. There's an additional option - "To show the join page" in case when a non-logged-in user tries to view the profile
plugin.author: Sergey Pryadkin
